Welcome to MicroExonator's documentation!
=========================================


.. centered:: MicroExonator is a set of algorithms that enable the systematic investigation of 


**Quick Summary**

    Brief summary of the problems and settings MicroExonator can be applied to.

    Instructions for the installation of MicroExonator.

    Background information regarding microexons.

    Information on instructions to run MicroExonator.

**Output**

**Licence**

    MicroExonator is freely available under the APACHE LICENSE, VERSION 2.0 - The software can be freely used, modified or added to other pipelines and workflows.


**Support**

    Contact information for questions, ideas, feature requests and potential bug reports.
